mapper.select: select shop_key, shop_code, shop_name, business_person_code, liable_person_code, shop_status, category_key, description, province, city, district, detail,cooperation_type from shop

select shop_key, shop_code, shop_name, business_person_code, liable_person_code, shop_status, category_key, description, province, city, district, detail,cooperation_type from shop where shop_key = #{shopKey}
mapper.insert: insert into shop(shop_key,shop_code, shop_name, business_person_code, liable_person_code, shop_status, category_key, description, province, city, district, detail,cooperation_type) values (#{shopKey},#{shopCode}, #{shopName}, #{businessPersonCode}, #{liablePersonCode}, #{shopStatus}, #{categoryKey}, #{description}, #{province}, #{city}, #{district}, #{detail},#{cooperationType})

insert into shop(shop_code, shop_name, business_person_code, liable_person_code, shop_status, category_key, description, province, city, district, detail,cooperation_type) values
(#{entity.shopCode}, #{entity.shopName}, #{entity.businessPersonCode}, #{entity.liablePersonCode}, #{entity.shopStatus}, #{entity.categoryKey}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.province}, #{entity.city}, #{entity.district}, #{entity.detail},#{entity.cooperationType})

insert into shop(shop_code, shop_name, business_person_code, liable_person_code, shop_status, category_key, description, province, city, district, detail) values
(#{entity.shopCode}, #{entity.shopName}, #{entity.businessPersonCode}, #{entity.liablePersonCode}, #{entity.shopStatus}, #{entity.categoryKey}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.province}, #{entity.city}, #{entity.district}, #{entity.detail},#{entity.cooperationType})
on duplicate key update shop_code = values(shop_code), shop_name = values(shop_name), business_person_code = values(business_person_code), liable_person_code = values(liable_person_code), shop_status = values(shop_status), category_key = values(category_key), description = values(description), province = values(province), city = values(city), district = values(district), detail = values(detail) cooperation_type=values(cooperation_type)
mapper.update:
update shop
shop_code = #{shopCode},
shop_name = #{shopName},
business_person_code = #{businessPersonCode},
liable_person_code = #{liablePersonCode},
shop_status = #{shopStatus},
category_key = #{categoryKey},
description = #{description},
province = #{province},
city = #{city},
district = #{district},
detail = #{detail},
cooperation_type = #{cooperationType},
where shop_key = #{shopKey}
